document.full_text: sergio garcia charged into contention at the byron nelson championship in irving, texas, thursday just three days after pulling out of a british open qualifier because of an infected fingernail.
document.title: overton sets byron nelson pace as garcia surges
lines_and_colors: sergio garcia charged into contention at the byron nelson championship in irving, texas, thursday just three days after pulling out of a british open qualifier because of an infected fingernail.
